name: Chenyu Brew
effect:
Restores 8–10% of Max HP to the selected character.
Regenerates 210–300 HP every 5s for the next 30s.
description: Common Liyue tea. Sometimes, one might compare life to the sweet aftertaste savored upon sipping a cup of tea.

suspicious.effect: Restores 8% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 210 HP every 5s for 30s.
suspicious.description: Common Liyue tea. You find yourself constantly sipping at it doubtfully, only to confirm that yes, this so-called tea still tastes like water. Was the low temperature the problem, or has it not had enough time to steep?

normal.effect: Restores 9% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 260 HP every 5s for 30s.
normal.description: Common Liyue tea. Sometimes, one might compare life to the sweet aftertaste savored upon sipping a cup of tea.

delicious.effect: Restores 10% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 300 HP every 5s for 30s.
delicious.description: Common Liyue tea. Your initial sip brings forth flavor on an elegant light breeze, the sweet fragrances of Chenyu Vale alighting upon your lips and tongue. Hark — is that the sweet tinkling of the mountain springs singing in your ear?
